item.title: DK - Children’s Illustrated Thesaurus
item.description: 内容简介 · · · · · · A comprehensive, illustrated thesaurus created specifically for young readers and writers, with more than 4,000 entries and authoritative content.

item.title: The Well-Spoken Thesaurus
item.description: 内容简介 · · · · · · For example, as replacements for absolutely,A" Roget’s thesaurus lists several adverbs–A"extremely,A" exactly,A" perfectlyA"; The Well-Spoken Thesaurus provides both words and phrases–A"categorically,A" without question,A" by any measureA"–that offer greater flexibility in shaping a potent, poetic sentence.
